message.body: Hi John, Will be showing the apt today around 330-4pm and tomorrow various times. If you need a couple days extra to move out no problem, no charge. We
will not get to it for a few days anyway. Jim
Hi Jim. Thanks for the heads up. I apologize, the apartment might be a bit of a mess today. I'll have it cleaned up for tomorrow.
Would you happen to have any new information about the furniture that I wanted to leave?
We cannot use it. But I am still asking around if someone wants it.
